data.meta_description: Aug 16, 2017 - Anna Alexeievna Koltovskaya (c. 1557-5 Apr 1626 age 69) Russia, child of Alexei Koltovski. Tsaritsa 1572-1574. 4th wife 29 Apr 1572 of Tsar Ivan IV Terrible Vasilyevich Rurik (25 Aug 1530-28 Mar 1584) Russia. After 2 years of marriage Ivan IV tired of his wife. He divorced her & sent her to the convent of Vedenski-Tikhvinski with the name of Nun Daria. Only Anna & Maria Fyodorovna Nagaya (c.1572-1608 age 36), the 7th wife of Ivan IV The Terrible, outlived him. See more ideas about russia, russian painting, painting.
